title: UML Diagram with Mermaid
description: Create sequence diagrams to visualize workflows or interactions.
example:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant Server
    Client->>Server: Request GET /users
    Server-->>Client: JSON Response
```

title: Multi-Column Layout with Inline HTML
description: Simulate columns in Markdown by combining inline HTML.
example:
### Column 1 Content for the first column.
### Column 2 Content for the second column.

title: Advanced Data Table with Links and Images
description: Add enriched tables with links and images for better data representation.
example:
| Product       | Description                              | Image                             |
|---------------|------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| [Product A](#) | High-performance product for professionals | ![Image A](https://via.placeholder.com/50) |
| [Product B](#) | Beginner-friendly product               | ![Image B](https://via.placeholder.com/50) |

title: Conditional Content with Markdown Extensions
description: Include conditional content based on specific flags or files.
example: {!conditional.md}

title: Task List with State Tracking
description: Track task progress with metadata in lists.
example:
- [x] **Task 1**: Completed on 2024-12-01
- [ ] **Task 2**: In progress - Deadline: 2024-12-15
  - Sub-task: Analyze data
- [ ] **Task 3**: Not started yet

title: Annotated Code Blocks
description: Add inline annotations to explain code in Markdown.
example:
```javascript
function fibonacci(n) { // Recursive function
  if (n <= 1) return n; // Base case
  return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2); // Recursive calls
}
console.log(fibonacci(5)); // Outputs 5
```

title: API Documentation with Anchored Tables
description: Document API endpoints with detailed tables and anchors.
example:
| Method  | Endpoint          | Description                       |
|---------|--------------------|-----------------------------------|
| GET     | [/api/users](#get-users) | Fetch all users                 |
| POST    | [/api/users](#post-users) | Create a new user               |
| PUT     | [/api/users/:id](#put-users) | Update an existing user         |
| DELETE  | [/api/users/:id](#delete-users) | Delete a user                   |

### Details
#### GET /api/users
Returns a JSON list of users.

title: Auto-Generated Table of Contents
description: Generate a dynamic TOC in Markdown using extensions.
example:
<!-- toc -->
# Introduction
## Features
## Benefits
<!-- tocstop -->

title: Executable Code Blocks with Outputs
description: Include code examples with visible execution outputs, such as with Jupyter.
example:
```python
# Solving a quadratic equation
import math
a, b, c = 1, -3, 2
delta = b**2 - 4*a*c
root1 = (-b + math.sqrt(delta)) / (2*a)
root2 = (-b - math.sqrt(delta)) / (2*a)
(root1, root2)
```

title: Interactive Timeline with Mermaid
description: Create a project timeline using Mermaid diagrams.
example:
```mermaid
gantt
title Project Development Timeline
dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
section Backend
Server Setup :done, 2024-11-01, 2024-11-10
API Development :active, 2024-11-11, 2024-12-10
section Frontend
UI Design :2024-11-15, 2024-11-25
React Development :2024-11-26, 2024-12-20
section Testing
Integration & Validation :2024-12-21, 2024-12-30
```

title: Markdown with Embedded JSON Data
description: Render and describe JSON directly in Markdown.
example:
```json
{
  "name": "Markdown Test",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Render JSON inline!"
}
```

title: Checkbox with Custom Actions
description: Use Markdown features in actions for interactive demos or tasks.
example:
- [x] Configure Markdown with a linter.
- [ ] Add new examples to this list.
- [ ] Create a repository of useful Markdown tips.

title: Collapsible Sections
description: Hide and show sections to make large documents easier to read.
example:
<details>
  <summary>Click to Expand!</summary>
  
  This is a collapsible section. Use it to organize large files.
</details>

title: Code Block Tabs
description: Show multiple code languages with tabs using advanced Markdown processors.
example:
```tabbed-code
tabs: [JavaScript, Python, Go]
---
**JavaScript**
```javascript
console.log('Hello, JavaScript!');
```
---
**Python**
```python
print('Hello, Python!')
```
---
**Go**
```go
fmt.Println('Hello, Go!')
```
```

title: Embedded Video
description: Include an iframe for video tutorials or demos.
example: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Emoji Highlights
description: Use emojis to create a more engaging checklist or emphasize key points.
example:
- ✅ Task Completed
- ⚠️ Warning Message
- ❌ Issue Detected

title: Custom Admonitions
description: Create callout boxes to highlight notes, tips, or warnings.
example:
!!! note
    This is a note.

!!! warning
    This is a warning.

!!! success
    Everything is okay!

title: Advanced Diagrams with PlantUML
description: Use PlantUML syntax for complex diagrams.

title: Embedded Math Equations
description: Use LaTeX to embed advanced math equations.
example:
$$E = mc^2$$

Or inline math: \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\)

title: Custom Buttons
description: Add buttons using HTML for user interaction.
example: <button onclick="alert('Hello World!')">Click Me</button>

title: Interactive Graphs
description: Embed JavaScript-based interactive charts or graphs.

    participant Server
    Client->>Server: Request GET /users
    Server-->>Client: JSON Response

# Introduction

description: Include code examples with visible execution outputs, such as with Jupyter.
example:
```python
# Solving a quadratic equation
import math
a, b, c = 1, -3, 2
delta = b**2 - 4*a*c
root1 = (-b + math.sqrt(delta)) / (2*a)

description: Create a project timeline using Mermaid diagrams.
example:
```mermaid
gantt
title Project Development Timeline
dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
section Backend
Server Setup :done, 2024-11-01, 2024-11-10
API Development :active, 2024-11-11, 2024-12-10
section Frontend

title: Math Equations with LaTeX
description: Display complex mathematical equations using LaTeX.
example:
```math
y = ax^2 + bx + c
```

title: Collapsible Sections
description: Create collapsible sections for better navigation.
example:
<details>
  <summary>Click to expand</summary>
  This is hidden text that becomes visible when clicked.
</details>

title: Code Syntax Highlighting
description: Use syntax highlighting to display readable code.
example:
```json
{
  "name": "Example",
  "type": "demo",
  "version": "1.0.0"
}
```

title: Embedded YouTube Video
description: Embed YouTube videos in Markdown using HTML.
example: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Footnotes
description: Use footnotes for additional context or citations.
example:
This is a sentence with a footnote.[^1]

[^1]: This is the footnote text.

title: Image Gallery with Lightbox
description: Create an image gallery with clickable thumbnails.

title: Custom Emoji Support
description: Add custom emojis to enrich Markdown content.
example: Hello, world! :rocket: :sparkles:

title: Embedded External Content
description: Embed external content like Twitter posts or GitHub gists.
example: <script src="https://gist.github.com/username/gistid.js"></script>

title: Callouts for Notes and Warnings
description: Highlight specific sections with callouts.
example:
> **Note:** This is an important note.
> **Warning:** Proceed with caution!

title: Advanced Mermaid Flowchart
description: Design advanced flowcharts with Mermaid for decision trees.
example:
```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[Start] --> B{Decision}
    B -->|Yes| C[Do something]
    B -->|No| D[Do something else]
    C --> E[End]
    D --> E[End]
```
